name: Titanium.UI.iPhone.TableViewSeparatorStyle
summary: A set of constants for the style that can be used for the separatorStyle property of Titanium.UI.TableView.

constants.name: NONE
constants.summary: The separator cell has no distinct style.

constants.name: SINGLE_LINE
constants.summary: The separator cell has a single line running across its width. This is the default value.
